details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.7.3 JPEG2000 - Number of channels
details.description: The number of colour channels in the JPEG2000 data shall be 1, 3 or 4.

rule.description: The number of colour channels in the JPEG2000 data shall be 1, 3 or 4.

error.message: JPEG2000 image has %1 colour channels that is neither 1, 3 or 4
